name: 史蒂夫·雷丁顿
name_full: 史蒂夫·雷丁顿 Steven Reddington
introduction: Steven Reddington is an American actor, singer and voiceover artist. He started acting at a young age, performing in his first musical at ten years old. After graduating from college, he worked as an Investment Analyst. He soon realized that it wasn't the right path for him and decided to follow his acting aspirations. He has taken a variety of training, such as Long Form Improv with Ian Covell, Branding and Personalization with Sam Christensen and Acting with Meisner Focus with Vince Pisani. Steven is most known for playing Dr. Bradley Jenkins, on The Resident (2018)
